description:
The Class President believes that the size of the boobs and intelligence are inversely proportional, so she thinks Galko is living a very carefree life.
But, she changes her mind when she sees the bulletin board Galko was intensely staring at.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai que tu as une grande sœur ?
Is It True That You`re a Big Sister?
おねーちゃんって本当ですか?
